templates.template:
<xf:textboxrow name="options[client_id]" value="{$options.client_id}" label="{{ phrase('client_id') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}" explain="{{ phrase('con_acc_github_client_id_explain') }}" />
<xf:textboxrow name="options[client_secret]" value="{$options.client_secret}" label="{{ phrase('client_secret') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}" explain="{{ phrase('con_acc_github_client_secret_explain') }}" />

<xf:if is="!$providerData"> <xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="explain" arg-providerTitle="{$provider.title}" arg-keyName="{{ phrase('client_id') }}" arg-keyValue="{$provider.options.client_id}" /> <xf:else /> <xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="success" />
<xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="display_name" arg-name="{$providerData.username}" /> </xf:if>
